subject: Soccer
UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Borussia Dortmund’s Mario Goetze pulled out of training on his comeback from a hamstring injury, putting his participation in the Champions League final against Bayern Munich in doubt.
snippet: Borussia Dortmund’s Mario Goetze pulled out of training on his comeback from a hamstring injury, putting his participation in the Champions League final against Bayern Munich in doubt.
